headline.main: SAYS JEWS CLAIM HUGE REPARATIONS; Dr. Liebman Says Bill Will Be Presented to Nations When They Sit at Peace Table POINTS TO PERSECUTIONS He Calls at Junior Hadassah Meeting for Basic Solution of Jewish Problem

lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Nov. 22 -- The Jewish people will have a "tremendous reparation bill" to present to the nations when they sit around the peace table and will have the right to ask that the Jewish problem be solved in a fundamental way, Dr. Joshua Loth Liebman, rabbi of Temple Israel, declared tonight.
